## BCSRIF Project Summary

**Species Group:** Pacific Salmon  
**Location:** Province-wide  
**Partners:** Fisheries and Oceans Canada  
**Organization:** Pacific Salmon Foundation  
**Session(s):** Fish Health  
**Presentation Date(s):** December 11, 2025  
**Speakers:** Samantha James  
**Abstract:**  
The Pacific Salmon Foundation conducted a science-based review of hatcheries in the BC to evaluate performance and effectiveness. As part of that review, four â€˜omicsâ€™ technologies were evaluated for their utility in hatchery management and salmonid production: genomics, transcriptomics, proteomics, and metabolomics. The review provided technical details on the use of the various tools with examples of their relevance to hatchery deliverables and was accompanies by a user-focused manual to highlight genomic applications for present day hatchery operations. A summary of their findings and recommendations will be provided.
